name: CalculatedLDLCholesterol
title: Calculated LDL Cholesterol
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for calculated low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) laboratory results derived using mathematical equations based on other lipid values (i.e., total cholesterol, HDL-C, and triglycerides).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Laboratory Test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts for LDL-C laboratory tests in serum or plasma, expressed in mass per volume units (e.g., mg/dL), where the result is derived using mathematical equations based on other lipid values (i.e., total cholesterol, HDL-C, and triglycerides). Concepts included specify “calculated” in the Method field within the LOINC clinical laboratory terminology.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes LDL-C tests that are obtained through direct measurement and that do not specify “calculated” in the Method field within the LOINC clinical laboratory terminology.)

concept.display: Cholesterol in LDL [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma by calculation
